verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that Tartan <S%H8661><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> (when Sargon <S%H5623><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him,) and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it;

At the same <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amoz, <S%H531><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> and loose <S%H6605><s%> the sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> your loins, <S%H4975><s%> and put <S%H2502><s%> off your shoe <S%H5275><s%> from your foot. <S%H7272><s%> And he did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot. <S%H3182><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Like as my servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> has walked <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for a sign <S%H226><s%> and wonder <S%H4159><s%> on Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and on Ethiopia; <S%H3568><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> lead <S%H5090><s%> away the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> prisoners, <S%H7628><s%> and the Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> captives, <S%H1546><s%> young <S%H5288><s%> and old, <S%H2205><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot, <S%H3182><s%> even with their buttocks <S%H8357><s%> uncovered, <S%H2834><s%> to the shame <S%H6172><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And they shall be afraid <S%H2865><s%> and ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> their expectation, <S%H4007><s%> and of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> their glory. <S%H8597><s%>

And the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> isle <S%H339><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> such <S%H3541><s%> is our expectation, <S%H4007><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> we flee <S%H5127><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%> to be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria: <S%H804><s%> and how <S%H349><s%> shall we escape? <S%H4422><s%>
